We’re Here to Feed and Foster communities. We know there’s a big difference between being in a community, and being part of one.\n\n That’s why we work every day to make a positive impact on the thousands of places we call home.

We welcome you to sit back, unwind and appreciate the lovely sights and hints of the city while our best gourmet expert sets you up a scrumptious dinner utilizing the best and freshest ingredients.\n\n Shrek Restaurant’s legacy comes from its secret blend of spices and herbs which was built up in 1963.

01 We place the customer experience at the core of all we do
